The Book of Desires is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now The Book of Desires Terms and conditions 
  
Explore an intriguing world in The Book of Desires, a thrilling Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game! Ashley had a horrible dream where she traveled to a strange world. When she awoke she realized it was just a nightmare, but her reality turns out to be just as scary. Help her escape with her life in this exciting adventure! Beautiful graphics; Captivating story!   1.6   213 MB Publisher:
